title: Meta-Principle
summary: The foundational axiom: nothing cannot recognize itself, forcing existence of non-trivial recognition.

title: The Ledger
summary: The universe's double-entry accounting system tracking all recognition events.

title: Recognition Events
summary: Atomic acts of distinction that write to the universal ledger with positive cost.

title: Dual-Balance
summary: Every recognition posts both debit and credit, ensuring global ledger closure.

title: Positive Cost
summary: All recognition events carry unavoidable positive cost, giving time its arrow.

title: Cost Functional J(x)
summary: The unique cost functional J(x)=½(x+1/x) that makes balance cheap and extremes expensive.

title: Recognition Length
summary: The fundamental length scale λ_rec = √(ℏG/c³) arising from recognition granularity.

title: Recognition Time
summary: The fundamental time quantum τ_0 = λ_rec/c for one recognition tick.

title: Coherence Energy
summary: The fundamental energy quantum E_coh from minimal recognition cost.

title: 8-Beat Cycle
summary: The fundamental eight-tick recognition cycle from traversing 3D voxel vertices.

title: Voxel Grid
summary: The discrete 3D lattice structure underlying spacetime geometry.

title: Causal Stride
summary: The maximum rate c = 1 voxel/tick at which recognition propagates.

title: φ-Scaling
summary: Self-similar scaling by the golden ratio φ in recognition hierarchies.

title: Ledger Curvature
summary: How recognition density curves the ledger geometry, manifesting as gravity.

title: LNAL Machine Code

title: Recognition Paths
summary: All possible routes through recognition space, summed in quantum amplitudes.

title: Ledger Closure
summary: Mathematical requirement that all ledger entries sum to zero globally.
